backgroundInformationList.description: Heritage Designation notice for 349 George Street (Allan School)

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1024-2017 to designate 349 George Street (Allan School) (St. Paul’s, Ward 20) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE13.15 - Intention to Designate Under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act - 349 George Street
By-law 1024-2017 - To designate the property at 349 George Street (Allan School) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 349 George Street (Allan School) City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing By-law 1024-2017 - 349 George Street (Allan School) - Heritage Designation
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
